name: 5 Minute Restaurant Style Salsa Recipe
description: Learn how to make restaurant style salsa in just 5 minutes! A ridiculously easy blender recipe with incredible flavor. This may just become your "go-to" salsa recipe and you'll surely impress anyone you make it for!
recipeIngredient: (2) 14 ounce cans diced fire roasted tomatoes* (see Note)
1-2  fresh jalapenos, seeds removed and roughly chopped
3 tablespoons fresh lime juice, from about 2 small limes

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a blender (food processor would work as well). Pulse and blend a few times or until you reach desired consistency. It won't take long, maybe 30 seconds to 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all ingredients to a blender (food processor would work as well). Pulse and blend a few times or until you reach desired consistency. It won't take long, maybe 30 seconds to 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste the salsa, and based on your personal preference, adjust ingredients as necessary. Add more salt, cilantro, or perhaps more jalapeno if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste the salsa, and based on your personal preference, adjust ingredients as necessary. Add more salt, cilantro, or perhaps more jalapeno if desired.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to an airtight container and store in the fridge until serving. Serve with tortilla chips, in burritos, Mexican bowls or anywhere else you enjoy salsa.
